block.minecells.cell_crafter.not_enough_: You don't have enough of this item
You don't have all the necessary ingredients
advancements.minecells.cell_crafter: A crafter that runs on cells...
advancements.minecells.unlock.run_in_the: Run in the Promenade of The Condemned
Run in the Promenade of The Condemned
book.minecells.entries.weapons.multiple_: The Multiple-Nocks Bow uses up to 3 arrows (less if you don't have enough) and shoots them in fron of you, in a horizontal plane.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.bow_and_e: This bow works like the Infinity enchantment - using it doesn't require arrows.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.marksmans: The Marksmans Bow deals critical damage to enemies that are far away from you.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.infantry_: This Bow deals critical damage if the hit enemy is in near-melee range.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.quick_bow: Hold the Quick Bow drawn to continuously fire arrows.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.ice_bow:
The Ice Bow fires arrows that freeze the enemies on hit.

Requires Ice Arrows to shoot.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.nerves_of:
This fancy bow deals critical damage if you release the arrow at the right time.

You should do so right after you hear a sound while holding the bow drawn.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.heavy_cro:
The Heavy Crossbow is a slow and heavy weapon.

It loads 3 arrows from your inventory, and fires them as multiple little bolts in front of you in a short-range cone.

The more bolts hit the enemy, the more damage is dealt.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.explosive:
The Explosive Crossbow fires bolts that create a small but deadly explosion when they land.

This weapon requires Explosive Bolts to shoot.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.electric_:
This whip electrifies enemies in a short distance in front of you.

This electricity can spread to nearby enemies, so the more enemies you can find in a group, the better the efficiency of this weapon.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.lightning:
Focus the Lightning Bolt on an enemy to deal continuous damage and apply electricity.

The longer you hold, the more damage you deal. However - after a certain time, you will also hurt yourself.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.throwing_: A single-use projectile that applies bleeding.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.firebrand: A single use projectile, setting fire on enemies and blocks it hits.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.cudgel:
The Cudgel applies a short stun effect when you block an enemy's attack.

The stun lasts longer if you parry the attack instead.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.rampart: This shield makes you invulnerable for a short amount of time after parrying an attack.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.bloodthir: The Bloodthirsty Shield applies bleeding on nearby enemies when you parry an attack.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.assault_s:
The Assault Shield launches you forward when you start using it, dealing damage and knocking back enemies.

It has a longer cooldown than other shields due to this special effect.
book.minecells.entries.weapons.greed_shi:
The Greed Shield has a chance to drop some goodies when you parry a melee attack.

These include: gold and iron nuggets and bars, emeralds, and diamonds!
book.minecells.entries.weapons.ice_shiel:
The Ice Shield slows down enemies when you block an attack.

If you parry the attack, it will freeze them instead.
options.minecells.screenshake.tooltip:
Modify the global intensity of screen shake events added by Mine Cells.
Individual events can be tweaked in the minecells-client.json5 file.
0% disables all Mine Cells screen shakes.
